head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Schumer To Propose New College Loan Rules

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Schumer To Propose New College Loan Rules

block.p: Senator Charles E. Schumer and Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo yesterday announced a plan to change college loan applications. The proposal, which Senator Schumer said he would introduce as federal legislation, would require that lenders detail loan amounts, interest and fees in a table on loan applications. ''A high school graduate shouldn't need a law degree to pick a loan for college,'' Mr. Schumer said in a statement.
